src_original: ||sthūlāpattayaḥ samāptāḥ ||  3 tattvaratnāvalī  namaḥ śrīvajrasattvāya |  praṇamya vajrasattvasya caraṇāmbhoruhadvayam |
tgt_original: Advayavajra Tattvaratnāvalī namaḥ śrivajrasattvāya |  praṇamya vajrasattvasya caraṇāmbhoruhadvayam |  tattvaratnāvalīṃ brūmaḥ śaraccandrāmaladyuteḥ ||
